title: karmavE tArakavu
sahitya:
karmavE tArakavu jIvarigella


anupallavi

  karma tAraka kANo nishcayavI mAtu durmatiyanu biTTu marmavanaritare


caraNam 1    snAna ondE sAlade jaladabhi mAni dEvaranariyadu mEle 
tadgata sirilOlanna bimbisi mUlakAraNa bimbanabhiSEkavendare
 caraNam 2    japavanAcarisuvalli hrSIkapa upama rahitanenisi japisuva 
varNadoLiddu pAmararanu patita pAvananu pAvana mALpanendare
    caraNam 3    prANAgnihOtravembo bhOjana vastu nEmava nere tiLidu nAma 
mUruLLa anala mukhyaroLippa shrI mukundage nitya nEmavanaridare
    caraNam 4    kAlakAlakke biDade pavanarAya mA lOlana arcisuva mElE pratime 
shAlagrAmadi nelasiddu nIlavarNane pUje kombanendaridare
    caraNam 5    pavananayyana katheya kELuavaralli divija jIvEshana cittisi kavibhIrIDida 
vAyu digdEvateroLagiddu shravaNa mADipanendu priyadandarpitasidare
    caraNam 6    vishva taijasa prAnjara karmagaLannu cittadi nere tiLidu vishvAsa 
mADuta hariya takkaisuva krtyava taridu nitrisa ballavarigella
    caraNam 7    dinandinangaLoLage jIvaru mALpa EnEnu karmagaLa tAnE 
sAkuva guru purandara viTTala dInaroLiha pAvananendaridare
